terms.title: Service Fee
terms.description: The cost for this help request is $5, payable in advance. This fee covers an initial consultation and basic guidance.

terms.title: Scope of Service
terms.description: The assistance provided will be limited to advice, guidance, and possible spiritual practices or rituals. We do not guarantee the resolution of any paranormal or spiritual issues.

terms.title: Disclaimer
terms.description: The services offered are based on spiritual practices and beliefs. Results may vary, and we do not claim scientific validation for these practices
